West Coast Invitational

An annual offseason FIRST Tech Challenge competition created to highlight team's true potential and to show off what they have accomplished this year in a fun but competitive event.

Sign up!
Schedule
Learn more

Streaming

All matches will be streamed on the official West Coast Invitational YouTube channel and will be available for playback

Awards

WCI has awards for both the Winning and Finalist alliances, as well as a

Format

The event will follow standard Into the Deep season format including qualification matches, alliance selection, eliminations, and awards.
